table-layout.description: Sets the layout algorithm to be used for a table

visibility.description: Specifies whether or not an element is visible

break-after.description: Specifies the page-, column-, or region-break behavior after the generated box

border-left-color.description: Sets the color of the left border

overflow-x.description: Specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

transform-origin.description: Allows you to change the position on transformed elements

orphans.description: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the bottom of a page when a page break occurs inside an element

border-left.description: Sets all the left border properties in one declaration

border-top.description: Sets all the top border properties in one declaration

font-language-override.description: Controls the usage of language-specific glyphs in a typeface

text-decoration-color.description: Specifies the color of the text-decoration

column-count.description: Specifies the number of columns an element should be divided into

font-variant-ligatures.description: Controls which ligatures and contextual forms are used in textual content of the elements it applies to

column-rule.description: A shorthand property for setting all the column-rule-* properties

overflow-wrap.description: Specifies whether or not the browser may break lines within words in order to prevent overflow (when a string is too long to fit its containing box)

padding-right.description: Sets the right padding of an element

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height of an element

transform-style.description: Specifies how nested elements are rendered in 3D space

caption-side.description: Specifies the placement of a table caption

font-stretch.description: Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font family

text-decoration-line.description: Specifies the type of line in a text-decoration

align-self.description: Specifies the alignment for selected items inside a flexible container.

column-gap.description: Specifies the gap between the columns

animation-name.description: Specifies a name for the @keyframes animation

flex-wrap.description: Specifies whether the flexible items should wrap or not

padding-left.description: Sets the left padding of an element

border-radius.description: A shorthand property for setting all the four border-*-radius properties

border-collapse.description: Specifies whether or not table borders should be collapsed

column-rule-style.description: Specifies the style of the rule between columns

outline-color.description: Sets the color of an outline

border-color.description: Sets the color of the four borders

rest.description: A shorthand property for setting the rest-before and rest-after properties

cursor.description: Specifies the type of cursor to be displayed

image-orientation.description: Specifies a rotation in the right or clockwise direction that a user agent applies to an image (This property is likely going to be deprecated and its functionality moved to HTML)

word-break.description: Specifies line breaking rules for non-CJK scripts

opacity.description: Sets the opacity level for an element

background-size.description: Specifies the size of the background images

nav-up.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-up navigation key

float.description: Specifies whether or not a box should float

font-variant-numeric.description: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for numbers, fractions, and ordinal markers

voice-balance.description: Specifies the balance between left and right channels

background-color.description: Sets the background color of an element

overflow.description: Specifies what happens if content overflows an element's box

column-rule-color.description: Specifies the color of the rule between columns

transform.description: Applies a 2D or 3D transformation to an element

voice-stress.description: Indicates the strength of emphasis to be applied

background-origin.description: Specifies the positioning area of the background images

background.description: Sets all the background properties in one declaration

voice-pitch.description: Specifies the average pitch (a frequency) of the speaking voice

height.description: Sets the height of an element

font-variant-caps.description: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for capital letters

right.description: Specifies the right position of a positioned element

border-right-style.description: Sets the style of the right border

border-bottom.description: Sets all the bottom border properties in one declaration

hyphens.description: Sets how to split words to improve the layout of paragraphs

widows.description: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the top of a page when a page break occurs inside an element

left.description: Specifies the left position of a positioned element

border-right.description: Sets all the right border properties in one declaration

list-style-type.description: Specifies the type of list-item marker

display.description: Specifies how a certain HTML element should be displayed

nav-left.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-left navigation key

order.description: Sets the order of the flexible item, relative to the rest

animation-duration.description: Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds an animation takes to complete one cycle

image-rendering.description: Gives a hint to the browser about what aspects of an image are most important to preserve when the image is scaled

border-image-slice.description: Specifies the inward offsets of the image-border

outline-width.description: Sets the width of an outline

border-right-width.description: Sets the width of the right border

border-top-style.description: Sets the style of the top border

text-justify.description: Specifies the justification method used when text-align is "justify"

text-overflow.description: Specifies what should happen when text overflows the containing element

columns.description: A shorthand property for setting column-width and column-count

page-break-before.description: Sets the page-breaking behavior before an element

icon.description: Provides the author the ability to style an element with an iconic equivalent

font-variant-alternates.description: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs associated to alternative names defined in @font-feature-values

border-image.description: A shorthand property for setting all the border-image-* properties

text-decoration.description: Specifies the decoration added to text

transition-delay.description: Specifies when the transition effect will start

animation-timing-function.description: Specifies the speed curve of the animation

column-width.description: Specifies the width of the columns

border-top-left-radius.description: Defines the shape of the border of the top-left corner

position.description: Specifies the type of positioning method used for an element (static, relative, absolute or fixed)

animation-fill-mode.description: Specifies what values are applied by the animation outside the time it is executing

border-bottom-style.description: Sets the style of the bottom border

nav-index.description: Specifies the tabbing order for an element

nav-right.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-right navigation key

ime-mode.description: Controls the state of the input method editor for text fields

margin-top.description: Sets the top margin of an element

quotes.description: Sets the type of quotation marks for embedded quotations

flex-flow.description: A shorthand property for the flex-direction and the flex-wrap properties

image-resolution.description: Specifies the intrinsic resolution of all raster images used in/on the element

transition-property.description: Specifies the name of the CSS property the transition effect is for

backface-visibility.description: Defines whether or not an element should be visible when not facing the screen

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width of an element

object-position.description: Specifies the alignment of the replaced element inside its box

column-span.description: Specifies how many columns an element should span across

empty-cells.description: Specifies whether or not to display borders and background on empty cells in a table

font-size.description: Specifies the font size of text

hanging-punctuation.description: Specifies whether a punctuation character may be placed outside the line box

border.description: Sets all the border properties in one declaration

marquee-style.description: Sets the style of the moving content

border-spacing.description: Specifies the distance between the borders of adjacent cells

white-space.description: Specifies how white-space inside an element is handled

page-break-after.description: Sets the page-breaking behavior after an element

transition-timing-function.description: Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect

border-image-repeat.description: Specifies whether the image-border should be repeated, rounded or stretched

border-bottom-color.description: Sets the color of the bottom border

counter-reset.description: Creates or resets one or more counters

mark-before.description: Allows named markers to be attached to the audio stream

background-repeat.description: Sets how a background image will be repeated

box-shadow.description: Attaches one or more drop-shadows to the box

voice-duration.description: Specifies how long it should take to render the selected element's content

flex-grow.description: Specifies how much the item will grow relative to the rest

content.description: Used with the :before and :after pseudo-elements, to insert generated content

list-style-image.description: Specifies an image as the list-item marker

clear.description: Specifies which sides of an element where other floating elements are not allowed

mark-after.description: Allows named markers to be attached to the audio stream

border-bottom-width.description: Sets the width of the bottom border

mark.description: A shorthand property for setting the mark-before and mark-after properties

border-top-right-radius.description: Defines the shape of the border of the top-right corner

marquee-speed.description: Sets how fast the content scrolls

flex-shrink.description: Specifies how the item will shrink relative to the rest

border-image-outset.description: Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box

@font-face.description: A rule that allows websites to download and use fonts other than the "web-safe" fonts

transition.description: A shorthand property for setting the four transition properties

border-top-color.description: Sets the color of the top border

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width of an element

outline-offset.description: Offsets an outline, and draws it beyond the border edge

font-size-adjust.description: Preserves the readability of text when font fallback occurs

font-variant-position.description: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs of smaller size positioned as superscript or subscript regarding the baseline of the font

border-left-width.description: Sets the width of the left border

top.description: Specifies the top position of a positioned element

text-indent.description: Specifies the indentation of the first line in a text-block

transition-duration.description: Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds a transition effect takes to complete

voice-volume.description: Refers to the amplitude of the waveform output by the speech synthesises

page-break-inside.description: Sets the page-breaking behavior inside an element

text-orientation.description: Defines the orientation of the text in a line

border-top-width.description: Sets the width of the top border

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height of an element

width.description: Sets the width of an element

outline-style.description: Sets the style of an outline

marks.description: Adds crop and/or cross marks to the document

border-width.description: Sets the width of the four borders

phonemes.description: Specifies a phonetic pronunciation for the text contained by the corresponding element

break-before.description: Specifies the page-, column-, or region-break behavior before the generated box

marquee-direction.description: Sets the direction of the moving content

overflow-y.description: Specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

flex.description: Specifies the length of the item, relative to the rest

animation-direction.description: Specifies whether or not the animation should play in reverse on alternate cycles

animation.description: A shorthand property for all the animation properties below, except the animation-play-state property

text-align.description: Specifies the horizontal alignment of text

list-style-position.description: Specifies if the list-item markers should appear inside or outside the content flow

padding.description: Sets all the padding properties in one declaration

margin-bottom.description: Sets the bottom margin of an element

filter.description: Defines effects (e.g. blurring or color shifting) on an element before the element is displayed

font-weight.description: Specifies the weight of a font

word-wrap.description: Allows long, unbreakable words to be broken and wrap to the next line

bottom.description: Specifies the bottom position of a positioned element

tab-size.description: Specifies the length of the tab-character

list-style.description: Sets all the properties for a list in one declaration

border-left-style.description: Sets the style of the left border

font-feature-settings.description: Allows control over advanced typographic features in OpenType fonts

font-style.description: Specifies the font style for text

padding-bottom.description: Sets the bottom padding of an element

animation-play-state.description: Specifies whether the animation is running or paused

outline.description: Sets all the outline properties in one declaration

padding-top.description: Sets the top padding of an element

border-style.description: Sets the style of the four borders

font.description: Sets all the font properties in one declaration

perspective.description: Specifies the perspective on how 3D elements are viewed

rest-before.description: Specifies a rest or prosodic boundary to be observed before speaking an element's content

animation-delay.description: Specifies when the animation will start

justify-content.description: Specifies the alignment between the items inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space.

background-attachment.description: Sets whether a background image is fixed or scrolls with the rest of the page

rest-after.description: Specifies a rest or prosodic boundary to be observed after speaking an element's content

box-decoration-break.description: Sets the behaviour of the background and border of an element at page-break, or, for in-line elements, at line-break.

border-image-source.description: Specifies an image to be used as a border

box-sizing.description: Tells the browser what the sizing properties (width and height) should include

@font-feature-values.description: Allows authors to use a common name in font-variant-alternate for feature activated differently in OpenType

resize.description: Specifies whether or not an element is resizable by the user

border-bottom-right-radius.description: Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-right corner

background-position.description: Sets the starting position of a background image

background-image.description: Sets the background image for an element

align-items.description: Specifies the alignment for items inside a flexible container.

text-combine-upright.description: Specifies the combination of multiple characters into the space of a single character

animation-iteration-count.description: Specifies the number of times an animation should be played

flex-direction.description: Specifies the direction of the flexible items

font-family.description: Specifies the font family for text

font-variant-east-asian.description: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for East Asian scripts (e.g Japanese and Chinese)

align-content.description: Specifies the alignment between the lines inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space.

font-synthesis.description: Controls which missing typefaces (bold or italic) may be synthesized by the browser

unicode-bidi.description: Used together with the direction property to set or return whether the text should be overridden to support multiple languages in the same document

border-right-color.description: Sets the color of the right border

font-kerning.description: Controls the usage of the kerning information (how letters are spaced)

margin-left.description: Sets the left margin of an element

break-inside.description: Specifies the page-, column-, or region-break behavior inside the generated box

object-fit.description: Specifies how the contents of a replaced element should be fitted to the box established by its used height and width

text-decoration-style.description: Specifies the style of the line in a text decoration

marquee-play-count.description: Sets how many times the content move

border-bottom-left-radius.description: Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-left corner

letter-spacing.description: Increases or decreases the space between characters in a text

column-rule-width.description: Specifies the width of the rule between columns

background-clip.description: Specifies the painting area of the background

vertical-align.description: Sets the vertical alignment of an element

text-underline-position.description: Specifies the position of the underline which is set using the text-decoration property

font-variant.description: Specifies whether or not a text should be displayed in a small-caps font

z-index.description: Sets the stack order of a positioned element

border-image-width.description: Specifies the widths of the image-border

flex-basis.description: Specifies the initial length of a flexible item

margin.description: Sets all the margin properties in one declaration

text-align-last.description: Describes how the last line of a block or a line right before a forced line break is aligned when text-align is "justify"

nav-down.description: Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-down navigation key

perspective-origin.description: Specifies the bottom position of 3D elements

margin-right.description: Sets the right margin of an element

word-spacing.description: Increases or decreases the space between words in a text
